title: Instructional Design Scenarios for Improving the Effectiveness of Clinical Preceptor Education

context.additional_context: Medical students learn to evaluate and improve the educational effectiveness of clinical preceptors, combining online lectures (theory) with offline practical sessions (applying assessment tools)
